news.title: Extra Sauce Agency Achieves Record Growth in Q4 2024
news.excerpt: We're excited to share that Q4 2024 was our strongest quarter yet, with 150% growth in client pipeline generated.
news.content: We're thrilled to announce that Q4 2024 marked a significant milestone for Extra Sauce Agency. Our client partners generated over $2.3M in qualified pipeline through our founder-led content strategies...
news.author: Manny Jassal

news.title: Welcoming New Team Members to Support Growing Client Base
news.excerpt: We're expanding our team with three new specialists to better serve our growing roster of B2B clients.
news.content: As we continue to scale, we're excited to welcome Sarah Martinez as our new Content Strategist, David Kim as Video Production Lead, and Lisa Rodriguez as Client Success Manager...
news.author: Manny Jassal

news.title: The SAUCE Recipe™ Officially Trademarked
news.excerpt: Our proprietary methodology for founder-led content marketing is now officially trademarked.
news.content: We're proud to announce that The SAUCE Recipe™, our systematic approach to founder-led content marketing, has been officially trademarked...
news.author: Manny Jassal

news.title: Strategic Partnership with LinkedIn for B2B Content Excellence
news.excerpt: We're partnering with LinkedIn to provide exclusive insights on B2B content best practices.
news.content: Extra Sauce Agency is excited to announce our strategic partnership with LinkedIn to help B2B companies maximize their presence on the platform...
news.author: Manny Jassal
